name: ClaudeUsageBar
tagline: Know exactly how much Claude you have left at a glance
description: Free, open-source macOS menu bar app that displays your Claude AI usage percentage. Get notifications before hitting your limit. Lightweight, private, and native.

name: Pretty Prompt 1.0 Extension and Web App
tagline: Grammarly for prompting. Turn any text into perfect prompts.
description: Improve your prompts in one click without leaving your browser. Works inside ChatGPT, Gemini, Claude, Perplexity, Lovable, and more AI tools.

name: skills.sh
tagline: The Agent Skills Directory
description: Discover and install skills for AI agents. Skills are reusable capabilities for AI agents. Install them with a single command to enhance your agents with access to procedural knowledge: npx skills add

name: Herodot AI
tagline: Travel at any place like with a personal local guide
description: We work on Herodot AI for more than two years moving from just a nice concept to truly reliable, easy to use app. Our task is to give you a feeling that you walk and travel with a knowledgeable local friend, who can guide you pretty much like a human, telling exciting stories on what is around, whatever catches your eye. Due to Google Cloud AI startups support program, we could make many of app features free. We hope you try and enjoy it on your next trip!

name: DestMate
tagline: Alarm with location wake-up and earphone-only sound
description: Wake up exactly when you need to‚Äîeven on long rides. üöÜ DestMate is a smart, location-based travel alarm for commuters and travelers. Set your destination and get alerted as you approach, privately through your headphones or earbuds. Includes a time failsafe, missed-stop alerts, ETA tracking, QR alarm sharing, and offline maps. Battery-efficient, privacy-first, and perfect for napping on the go. Arrive awake, not anxious.

name: AI Proctor by Qlay
tagline: AI Proctor: AI that protects fairness in hiring & tests
description: AI Proctor by Qlay detects the most sophisticated AI-assisted and other forms of cheating during online tests and interviews. It uses a mobile app that turns the candidate‚Äôs smartphone into a second camera. With object-detection AI, the app monitors the environment in real time and flags unauthorized devices as well as suspicious body, head, or hand movements.

name: RUSTWA
tagline: A Unofficial WhatsApp Web API built in Rust
description: No feature bloat. No crazy configs. Just the stuff most people actually need: ‚úÖ send text + media ‚úÖ receive messages via webhooks ‚úÖ multi-session support ‚úÖ QR login with session persistence ‚úÖ web dashboard ‚úÖ fast async runtime with Tokio The goal: cover ~90% of automation use-cases without turning into a monster system. If you‚Äôre building WhatsApp automation, bots, or internal tools ‚Äî would love for you to try it and tear it apart üòÑ Feedback, issues, and PRs are more than welcome.

name: DoppelIQ Atlas
tagline: Pre-test marketing decisions with AI consumer simulations
description: DoppelIQ Atlas is an AI consumer simulation engine that lets you simulate behavior at population scale. Instead of collecting opinions from small panels or asking AI personas to ‚Äúpretend‚Äù to be users, Atlas runs 100,000 consumer simulations enriched with real-world attributes. This allows you to test marketing questions at scale with responses that are consistent, explainable, and representative, so you can validate messaging, pricing, and launch decisions before going to market.

name: PageSpeed.cloud
tagline: AI-based PageSpeed insights with clear actions for teams!
description: Google PageSpeed Insights provides accurate performance data, but turning that data into clear actions is often difficult. PageSpeed.cloud is an AI-based layer on top of Google PageSpeed Insights that converts technical reports into prioritized, implementation-ready action items. It explains what to fix, why it matters, and how to act‚Äîcovering Core Web Vitals, performance, accessibility, and SEO‚Äîso teams can improve speed and user experience with clarity and confidence.

name: Supatrack
tagline: Fitness & Nutrition app
description: Track calories with your friends, not alone. Supatrack makes nutrition fun with squads, challenges, and accountability. Join the movement to listen to world leading nutritionists through our exclusive podcasts and make healthy living social and motivating!

name: Genie 3
tagline: A new frontier for world models
description: Genie 3 is a new frontier for world models, using simple text descriptions to generate photorealistic environments that can be explored in real-time.

name: Erlara
tagline: Proof that you‚Äôre more capable than you think
description: Erlara is a free progress journal for people who are more capable than they think. It helps you capture small wins in seconds, using voice or text, so your effort does not disappear by the end of the day. There are no streaks, no guilt, and no pressure to keep up. If it took effort, it counts. Erlara exists to reflect what you are already doing, even when it does not feel like it.

name: Jello
tagline: Create games with photos and sounds, share & compete
description: üéÆ Create personalized games with your own photos and sounds! Customize 8 classic games (Whack-A-Mole, Memory, Hangman, Flappy, Dino Jump, Puzzles, Snake) to make them uniquely yours. Upload your images, add custom sounds, and share instantly via unique links. No downloads, no signups for players. Unlimited game creation, leaderboards, and complete customization. 100% free! üé®‚ú®

name: OpenPools.in
tagline: Find Your People, Build What Matters
description: Find your People. Build what Matters. Connect with peers, collaborators, and mentors who share your exact skill patterns. Powered by AI-driven keyword matching.

name: Trustora
tagline: Get paid upfront. Secure B2B milestones with Stripe Connect.
description: Stop chasing invoices. Trustora is the B2B OS that syncs legal contracts directly with Stripe payouts. It replaces "trust me bro" with code: ‚úÖ Milestone-based routing: Client funds it upfront, you get paid on approval. ‚úÖ Localized Contracts: Auto-generates clauses based on country. ‚úÖ Fair Pricing: Fees are capped at $150 (no % gouging on high-ticket projects). Built with Laravel & Next.js to kill "Shadow Admin" work.

name: Owlab - Design Feedback
tagline: The all-in-one visual feedback tool for creative teams
description: Streamline design reviews with Design Feedback. Place comments directly on any image or live website. Features: + Visual Point & Click Annotation + Real-time Team Collaboration + Built-in Task Management + Version Control & Comparison + Instant Guest Sharing Links Stop decoding vague emails, chat. Built for remote creative teams to approve work faster.

name: Mixels.ai | The AI Pixel Art Generator
tagline: AI Pixel Art Avatar Generator & Free Online Pixel Art Studio
description: Mixels.ai is a free AI pixel art software with perfect grid alignment. Convert photos to pixel art avatars or generate game-ready sprites from text. No mixels, no cleanup, no green fringing. The best free pixel art editor and Aseprite alternative with complete studio suite and Ai image pixel editor tools for retro game devs and pixel art lovers built right built in! Coming soon: 32x32 and 128x128 Resolutions, Items, Backgrounds, Full Photo-To-Pixel Art Conversion, Pixel Doctor Advanced + more!

name: PromptPilot
tagline: Transform Weak Prompts Into Powerful AI Instructions
description: PromptPilot is a browser extension for ChatGPT and Gemini that turns your normal prompts into powerful, structured instructions in one click. Write naturally and let PromptPilot add clear intent, context, constraints, and output format to deliver consistent, high-quality AI responses. Unlike prompt libraries or chat wrappers, it works inside your existing tools‚Äîturning prompting from trial-and-error into a repeatable system

name: UpReport
tagline: Turn downtime into trust with AI‚Äëpowered status page
description: UpReport helps SaaS teams communicate incidents clearly and build trust during downtime. It provides a single status page with role-based visibility, where public audiences see clear service health and uptime, while logged-in team members access deeper operational context, metrics, and timelines. With built-in monitoring, AI-assisted incident updates, and fast setup, UpReport keeps customers informed and teams aligned when reliability matters most.

name: FocusMatrix
tagline: Eisenhower Matrix for Priority Management
description: FocusMatrix is a simple tool to help you stop juggling everything at once and start working on the right things. It‚Äôs based on the Eisenhower Matrix a proven way to sort tasks by what‚Äôs important and what‚Äôs urgent. Instead of a long, overwhelming to-do list, you get a clear 2√ó2 view that tells you what to do now, what to plan, what to delegate, and what to drop. The goal is clarity, not complexity. No cluttered features, no distractions ‚Äî just a clean space to think, decide, and move forward.
